name: v5.6.0
body: - #387 allow users to use AtCoder's system cases

name: v5.5.3
body: - #381 remove garbage output which is printed only on macOS

name: v5.5.2
body: - #378 allows empty Markdown files as documentation files (@granddaifuku)

name: v5.5.1
body: - #374 fix the error which happens when root source files are not included for Rust packages (@kuretchi)

name: v5.5.0
body: - #369 add links from generated documents to GitHub Actions when some tests fails

name: v5.4.1
body: - https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/363 fix the bug that GitHub Pages was not updated when `main` branch is the default

name: v5.4.0
body:
- #346 add Rust support (@qryxip)
- #355 suppress the flickering of links in generated documents
- #356 set timeout for the dependency analysis of Python files

name: v5.3.0
body:
- https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/336 make multiple `-I` options usable for `oj-bundle`  (@kjnh10)
- https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/341 fix a bug of `oj-bundle` about C++ files without extentions, e.g. headers of AtCoder Library (@kjnh10)
- Also, an update of [atcoder/ac-library](https://github.com/atcoder/ac-library) (https://github.com/atcoder/ac-library/pull/72) makes `oj-bundle` workable with AC Library (thank you @yosupo06)

name: v5.2.1
body: - https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/333 remove `.verify-helper/.gitignore` if exists in users' git repository

name: v5.2.0
body:
- #324 speed up analyzing C++ code. A heavy internal function becomes 7x faster. (@beet-aizu)
- #328 sort links on documents (@beet-aizu)
- #329 update the document and specification of `documentation_of` path for Markdown document
- #330 fix the document generation for AtCoder Library

name: v5.1.0
body:
- #309 fix a bug of URL detection for documentation (@sash2104)
- #310 fix a typo (@ryo-n)
- #313 #314 add partial support for Haskell, Ruby, Go, and Java

name: v5.0.1
body: - #304 fix a broken hint message (@sash2104)

name: v5.0.0
body:
- https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/296 add flags to expand stacks of C++ programs for Cygwin environments ([@jellc](https://github.com/jellc))
- https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/287 https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/289 https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/290 https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/294 https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/300 https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/301 (breaking changes) update the document generator
  - URLs of pages are changed. redirection is enabled.
  - improve the width of columns of the default theme
  - make the syntax highlighting correct for non-C++ languages
  - make `.verify-helper/docs/index.md` embedded into the top page
  - remove `@see` `@sa` directive and now detect and use all URLs in source code
  - remove `@category` directive
  - remove `@ignore` directive and now recognize `exclude: [PATH, ...]` in `.verify-helper/docs/_config.yml`
  - mark deprecated `@docs path/to/doc.md` and now recognize standalone Markdown files with `documentation_of: path/to/source.code` front-matter
  - There are many internal changes. The generated documents of libraries which use customized themes may be broken :bow:

name: v4.12.1
body:
- #281 fix the bug that sometimes we cannot compile the generated codes of oj-bundle on Windows (pull requested by @jellc)
- #283 enable to include non-standard system headers like ext/* or tr1/* (pull requested by @jellc)

name: v4.12.0
body: - #278 colorize logs

name: v4.11.0
body: - #273 add the builtin support for Python (@knuu)

name: v4.10.3
body: - #268 fix a bug about analyzing dependencies of Nim files (@zer0-star)

name: v4.10.2
body:
- https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/255 fix many problems on Windows (@tsutaj)
- https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/265 add an error message for failures of analyzing dependencies
- https://github.com/online-judge-tools/verification-helper/pull/264 add an error message for failures of `oj-bundle` on macOS

name: v4.10.1
body:
- #242 #243 increase the stack size on macOS (@morioprog)
- #244 prevent pushing documents to the `gh-pages` branch if `GH_PAT` is not set or is empty

name: v4.10.0
body:
- #236 support Nim (@chaemon)
- #239 fix the bug that `oj-verify` crashes when there are files whose `#include` directives are broken
- #238 add `.gitignore` to `.verify-helper/.gitignore`
- #237 add a workaround for a bug of installation of online-judge-tools

name: v4.9.1
body: - #212  fix a bug of bundler about `#include` with relative paths

name: v4.9.0
body:
- #200 detect available compilers and add settings to specify compilers and options
- #204 add `--config-file` option
- #207 fix a bug about timestamps (@key-moon)
- #209 fix a bug about escaping (@key-moon)

name: v4.8.0
body:
- #192 improve C++ bundler
- #193 #194 improve document generator
- #196 improve logging

name: v4.7.0
body:

- #183 #188 add `verification_file_suffix` field to `config.toml`
- #185 improve stability
- #187 add a workaround about stack overflow on WSL

name: v4.6.1
body: - #175 #176 fix some bugs

name: v4.6.0
body: - #168 add a link to [this repo](https://github.com/kmyk/online-judge-verify-helper) to generated documents (@beet-aizu)

name: v4.5.0
body:
- #163 add newlines before documents inserted with `@docs`
- #162 improve the error message for the case where `PROBLEM` is not specified
- #161 improve outputs for failed tests

name: v4.4.0
body:
- #157 make it robust for failures of generater.py of Library Checker
- #154 add documents for C# script support (@key-moon)
- #155 add `--tle` option and `--timeout` option (@beet-aizu)

name: v4.3.0
body: - #151 improve the output in cases where some tests failed

name: v4.2.0
body:
- #146 #148 add C# script support (@key-moon)
- #145 add yukicoder support using tokens (@beet-aizu)
- #144 make running Jekyll in `.verify-helper/markdown` easier with Ruby's Bundler

name: v4.1.0
body:
- [breaking] https://github.com/kmyk/online-judge-verify-helper/pull/127 replace `oj-verify bundle` subcommand with `oj-bundle` command
- https://github.com/kmyk/online-judge-verify-helper/pull/126 make `.verify-helper/.gitignore`
- https://github.com/kmyk/online-judge-verify-helper/pull/125 add `python_requires='>=3.6'`
- https://github.com/kmyk/online-judge-verify-helper/issues/101 fix a bug with no `.test.cpp`

name: v3.4.1
body:
-   #107 #110: translate README and the web installer page into English (@southball)
-   #112: fix a bug of the bundle feature about files which have no newline at end of file (@sash2104)
-   #104: fix a behavior when `$GITHUB_ACTION` is defined but `$GITHUB_TOKEN` isn't

name: v3.4.0
body:
- C++ 以外の言語に対応
- ドキュメントの見た目を改善
- `oj-verify docs` の出力先を `md-output` から `.verify-helper/markdown/` に変更
- テストを追加
- `pip3 install -e .` ができなかった問題を修正

name: v3.3.0
body:
- Library Checker のテストケースのキャッシュまわりを高速化
- `--jobs` オプションを付けたときソースコード間の依存関係の解析を並列でするように

name: v3.2.0
body: - verify が落ちてたらドキュメントのアイコンが :x: になるようになった (@sash2104 )
- timestamp まわりがバグってたので修整

- 60 秒で TLE するように設定
- bundle 機能のコメントに関するバグを修正

name: v3.1.0
body: - 手元での verify 実行時に commit 時刻でなく変更時刻を見るようになった

name: v3.0.1
body:
- 主にドキュメント生成の高速化
- bundle 機能における相対 include のバグを修正
- `--jobs` オプションを付けると並列実行されるようになった

name: v3.0.0
body:
- feature: `#include` の自動展開をするサブコマンド `bundle` を追加
- feature: `#include` の展開をするボタンをドキュメントに追加
- broken: `init` サブコマンドを削除 (使われてないため)

name: v2.5.0
body: あとで書く

name: v2.4.2
body: - fix: GitHub Actions 上での実行を10分で打ち切る機能が消えていたので修正

name: v2.4.1
body:
* for users: installer document の更新
* fix: docs の見出し表記を変更
* fix: docs の "Depends On" 等において、依存関係を再帰的に調べるよう修正

name: v2.4.0
body:
* feature: verify badge, last commmit badge を Docs トップに表示
* feature: GitHub リポジトリ・ファイルへのリンク、及び最終 commit 日時を表示
* feature: `.verify-helper/docs/_config.yml` による Docs の設定編集に対応
* for users, developers: `LICENSE` の更新
* fix: 報告されたバグの修正

name: v2.3.0
body:
-  feature: GitHub Pages のデフォルトテーマが Dinky になった
-  feature: ライブラリ一覧ページのリンク名に `@brief` の中身が利用されるようになった
-  fix: カレントディレクトリに `testlib.h` が生成されて落ちる問題を解決した
-  for developers: verify 結果を push する部分を Python に移植した

name: v2.2.2
body: * minor update: ソースコード中に `{{ something }}` などの二重波括弧が含まれている場合にビルドが失敗する問題の修正

name: v2.2.1
body:
* minor update: docs 生成部分のバグを修正
* for developers: docs 生成部分に type hints を付与

-   生成されたドキュメントに :warning: だけでなく :heavy_check_mark: も付くように
-   root からの相対パスでの include に対応

name: v2.1.0
body:
- GitHub Pages の自動更新がうまくいかない問題を修正できるようにした (`GH_PAT` を追加してください)
- <https://judge.yosupo.jp> の問題の special judge が自動で利用されるようになった
- ドキュメントがすこしきれいになった

name: v2.0.2
body:
- @tsutaj によりドキュメント生成機能が追加
- ドキュメントを gh-pages に自動で push するように
- PyPI に登録

name: v1.2.0
body:
-   push 式の verify 結果のキャッシュ機能
-   `#define ERROR 1e-6` みたいなので誤差ジャッジが有効になる

-   cache の path が間違ってたので修正
-    GitHub Actions 上でも C++17 が動くぽいので C++17 に
